text: Firip ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Nza maaŋ muuŋgip K900.00 tuktɨgi vikntuu ga vhezgirga, kha gumgi gu mbigi, mbe bevbevira, mbe za fɨgi bisaŋri guarira mbegɨrga.”6.7 Ŋkɨɨar ŋkasŋka, nta zazera verav ndai. Mbe Grikin kaman khaŋ nzuai, “2000 ŋkɨɨar fɨgiveŋ ma.” Khaŋ muuŋgi ŋkɨɨa, nta sɨgɨra thɨgi kɨnin ŋgarigi ŋaara guma ga vhezi vheza fara muuŋgi.
